snippet: With temperatures soaring into triple digits on the field, home runs by Eric Chavez and Robinson Cano helped the Yankees split a four-game series with the White Sox.
abstract: New York Yankees defeat Chicago White Sox, 4-2; Yankees backup third baseman Eric Chavez goes 2 for 3 with a two-run homer.
lead_paragraph: With temperatures soaring into triple digits on the field, home runs by Eric Chavez and Robinson Cano helped the Yankees split a four-game series with the White Sox.

headline.seo: Chavez Helps Yankees Topple White Sox
headline.main: Hot Bats Provide Relief for Yankees
headline.print_headline: Hot Bat Provides Relief for Yanks and Ailing Chavez
